Jon Dunsdon shining a powerful light on the digital future of aviation! Proud to partner with Teradata to take on some of our customers  most powerful challenges.
Great to highlight our strategic partnership at Teradata PARTNERS , and deliver industry analytic solutions at scale for the largest global airlines with GE Aviation
Personally, as a big consumer of aviation services, I'm looking forward to improved  customer satisfaction. #Teradata

Had an absolute blast talking to students at the University of California, Irvine The Paul Merage School of Business last night with Junaid Hashim about a career in data analytics / business intelligence.

It's an exciting field thats growing and changing at a rapid pace. I highly encourage all of those with a strong intellectual curiosity and a knack for numbers to explore BI as a possible career. I'm sure there is someone in your network who is eager to give advice!

Global Vice President, Sales & Services Operations

Global Corporate Vice President for Teradata sales and services operations. Mobilizing more than 5,000 employees and $2 billion dollars in annual revenue. Organizational management for go-to-market strategy and operations, corporate development, strategic partnerships (including indirect, resale and inside sales channels), business operations, field deployment, marketing and education.Member of multiple Teradata executive committees and governance boards. Member of PARTNERS Conference Global Steering Committee.
Go-to-Market strategy directive with focus on developing lighthouse analytic partnerships. Transforming business solution selling and corporate go-to-market strategy.
Southwest US Region:  sales management of analytic fanatics that tirelessly partner at all levels in the enterprise. Grew southwest region revenue 690% in  less than four years.

Managed financial, operational and go-to-market transformation consulting projects for Fortune 500 enterprises.  Sales force effectiveness and CRM executive responsibility for end to end CRM and sales operation projects.

Co-Founded XING. Grew active channel partners from 0 to 3,000+. Globally executed partnerships to expand the multi-million dolloar XING brand.  XING continues to be one of the most recognized brands on the market.

recommendations: Jonathan Ripper
VP, Optimization
April 4, 2016, Jonathan was a client of Nate’s

Nate joined our Teradata account team in 2013 during a time when the business itself was in review.  We had an 8 year relationship with Teradata - but never in that time were they a true technology partner.  Nate very quickly established himself as partner - not a provider.  Nate took the time to get to know our business – learning the context for the solutions he was selling.  He was pivotal in winning back the business - and set the foundation for a true technology partnership.  He brings a very strong client services mindset -  and imaginative, always bringing new ideas or letting you bounce ideas off of him.  Taking a phone call from Nate is something I look forward to.  He does an excellent job of balancing representing a partner within his organization and his organization to the partner.  During his time on our account, he became a member of our extended team (at all levels).  He encouraged us to get the most out of the partnership - providing a wide array of opportunities for us to interact deep within the Teradata team and also with his other clients.  We’ve been a tough customer but Nate has always been responsive, unflappable and solution oriented.  He brings poise and professionalism that I find rare in the space.

summary: Nate Holiday has successfully built global enterprise businesses across multiple industries.   As Global Vice President of Sales & Services Operations, Nate's teams have generated over $2B in enterprise revenue, $3B in identified customer business value and an $1B in net new pipeline growth.  In 2017, the Go-to-marketing transformation through the implementations of the field organization realized the first product revenue increase in five years.Prior to Nate's assignment as Global Vice President, Nate was Teradata's VP of North & South America Sales & Services Operations.  Nate started his career at Teradata managing the Southwest Region of Teradata where Nate's team delivered 690% regional revenue growth in less than four years.Prior to Teradata, Nate managed analytic, financial & operational business consulting engagements across Fortune 500 enterprises for top-tier analytic firms.  Prior to his career in analytics, Nate co-founded XING Global which delivered 3X ROI for its investors.Expertise includes:- Revenue & Organizational Management- Go-to-Market Strategy & Transformations- Sales Management (enterprise, mid-market and inside sales)- Channel Optimization- Operations- Consulting Services- Data Management (analytics and big data / open-source data architecture)- Application Management (CRM, ERP, marketing and operations)
name: Nate Holiday
title: Global Vice President, Teradata Sales & Services Operations
